thread.title: Deeply pained, CM writes to Jathedar
thread.title_full: Deeply pained, CM writes to Jathedar

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Deeply pained, CM writes to Jathedar
text:
Tribune News Service
Amritsar, October 17
Chief Minister Parkash Singh Badal today paid obeisance at the Golden Temple and offered prayers for peace in the state. He also met Akal Takht Jathedar Giani Gurbachan Singh. In a letter to the Jathedar, the Chief Minister said: “What has happened over the last few days has shaken my conscience. It has caused immense pain to the Sikh community. Unpredictable instances are taking new turns which may be all the more dangerous. I have always discharged my duties to the best of my abilities, but at times something happens which is not in your control, causing immense mental trauma.” Bid to disturb peace: Dy CM Chandigarh: Deputy CM Sukhbir Badal today said the government would ensure exemplary punishment to sacrilege accused. He said it was an act of certain elements who wanted to disturb peace in the state.
